edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.deck.models

Class DeckModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<T>
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.abstractmodel.AbstractStorageModel<Deck>
        • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.deck.models.DeckModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModelObserver, IModelValidate, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<Deck>

    public class DeckModel
extends AbstractStorageModel<Deck>
    Holds the all of the Decks for all users in the database This DeckModel is designed to continuously reflect the exact model on the database
    Author:
    jonathanleitschuh
    See Also:
